wancha, dushana saha horakam sidukarana deshapalanagnyayanta erehiwa gathayuthu thindu thirana ganimata pasubata nowana bawath awanka, kriyashili saha pirisidu deshapalana wyaparayak ada me rate tharuna parapure menma samastha podu maha janathawage deshapalana pipasaya bawata pathwa athi bawath dushana, wancha saha horakam sidu karamin rate rajya sampath ha mahajanathawage depala anisi lesa bhawitha kara sakku purawa ganimata yam deshapalanagnyayek uthsaha karanawanam ohu kumana deshapalana pakshayakata ayath wuwada gatha yuthu thindu thirana nisi lesa ganimata thama kisiseth pasubata nowana bawath janadhipathiwaraya pawasiya.
